title: Text of the Letter from the President to Congressional Committee Chairs Transmitting the United States Strategy on Women, Peace, and Security – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
June 11, 2019
Dear Madam Chairwoman:   (Dear Mr. Chairman:)In accordance with section 5 of the Women, Peace, and Security Act of 2017 (Public Law 115-68) (the “Act”), I have enclosed the United States Strategy on Women, Peace, and Security (the “Strategy”).  The Strategy describes how my Administration will fulfill the policy objectives as set forth in section 4 of the Act.Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
